summary: Some irritating or unnecessary sounds of Skyrim altered or removed!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/Sounds1_zpsbc7076c2.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#00FFFF][size=5]Some of the irritating or unnecessary sounds of Skyrim altered or removed!
If you have a particular sound that you would like altering let me know![/color][/size]

[size=5]Sounds altered by this Mod to date:
Sneak Attack
Menu Confirmation
Smithing
Alchemy
Enchanting
Night Eye
Conjuration Effect
Aura Whisper Shout[/size]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/NewTitle_zps73aa8683.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Latest update:
Recorded new unique sound for Aura Whisper Shout
Edited Night Eye and Conjure Bound Weapon (Normalised 50% to reduce harsh volume)
Altered sounds in Smithing, Alchemy and Enchanting[/color]

[color=#00FF00]Are you tired of the really annoying, immersion breaking sound that plays when you hit an enemy with a sneak attack? If so then this mod is for you!
Now when an enemy goes down while you are sneaking, he goes down without the silly sound effect!

The Conjuration sound effect for when a Conjured being is produced, has been updated from a harsh metallic sound, to a more fitting thunderous sound!

Menu confirm sound has been altered to a quieter sound[/color]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/FireInstall_zps48f18dd9.jpg[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Installation:
For easy installation just use the Nexus Mod Manager.
To install manually copy the downloaded .esp and sound folder into your Skyrim\\Data folder[/color]

I hope you find this mod useful? I made it for my own personal use as the unrealistic sound effects annoyed me so much! If this mod is not to your taste, then feel free to move along to the next mod.

[color=#FF0000]Version history:
V1.0 Initial release
V1.1 Added improved Conjuration sound effect
V1.2 Changed Menu confirm to quieter sound
V1.3 Altered sounds in Smithing, Alchemy and Enchanting
V1.4 Edited Night Eye and Conjure Bound Weapon (Normalised 50% to reduce harsh volume)
V1.5 Corrected error in Smithing (Tanning Rack sound)
V1.6 Recorded new unique sound for Aura Whisper Shout[/color]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/FireCredits_zps48ef5175.jpg[/IMG]

Credits:
Additional sound effects courtesy of:

[url=http://www.royaltyfreemusic.com/]Royalty Free Music[/url]

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Please DO NOT upload any part of my mod any where else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
